title: Excited for Golden Week!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Hey, hey, Rina-chan, did you hear that Honoka-chan and Ai-chan are gonna go skateboarding during Golden Week?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah, I heard.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Umi-chan and Nozomi-chan seem to be going, too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Really? ...I’m actually kinda interested in going too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Same here... Hey, why don’t we ask if we could join them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Let’s do it. And while we’re at it, we should tell everyone else too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Good idea! Let’s do that~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Skateboarding sounds fun if we learn how to do it properly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I want to practice and get good at it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah! Rina-chan Board says, “Excited!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
